biotools.summary: Anipose is an open-source toolkit for robust, markerless 3D tracking of animal behavior from multiple camera views. It leverages the machine learning toolbox DeepLabCut to track keypoints in 2D, then triangulates across camera views to estimate 3D pose.

bioschemas.name: Anipose
bioschemas.summary: Anipose is an open-source toolkit for robust, markerless 3D tracking of animal behavior from multiple camera views. It leverages the machine learning toolbox DeepLabCut to track keypoints in 2D, then triangulates across camera views to estimate 3D pose.
